(used about houses, etc.) able to be bought or rented by people who do not earn a lot of money: affordable housing They have increased their provision of affordable housing in order to make home ownership accessible to buyers who would otherwise be unable to buy. According to the guidelines, ten percent of the dwellings in the development must be affordable.
